Description:
311843411 - PN - You have failed to prepare a contingency plan designed to secure so far as is reasonably practicable the restriction of exposure to Ionising Radiation for the health and safety of persons who may be affected by such an accident
311844195 - IN - You have failed to make a suitable and sufficient assessment of the risk to any employee and other person for the purpose of identifying the measures to be taken to restrict the radiation exposure of that employee or other person to ionising radiation during enclosure industrial radiography
311844197 - IN - You have failed to designate as classified persons those employees who are likely to receive an effective dose greater than 6 mSv per year or an equivalent dose greater than 15 mSv per year for the lens of the eye or greater than 150 mSv per year for the skin or the extremities and must immediately inform those employees that they have been so designated.
311844199 - IN - You have failed to ensure that each of your employees designated as classified persons is under adequate medical surveillance by a relevant doctor for the purpose of determining the fitness of each employee for the work with ionising radiation which that employee is to carry out.
